mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from article
order by ${orderByClause}

select aa.id, aa.article_title, aa.create_time,aa.user_id,aa.label,bb.nickname,bb.icon,aa.like_count,aa.browse_count,aa.comment_count,aa.anonymous_switch,aa.content_type from article aa LEFT JOIN fq_user bb on aa.user_id = bb.id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from article
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into article (article_title, create_time, user_id, del_flag, like_count, comment_count, browse_count, label, is_recommend, anonymous_switch, content_type, article_content ) values (#{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{label,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{anonymousSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
